title: (Patch 5.11) Increased size of the Numbers font.
body:
So with 5.11 we got a few new things, but one glaring change is that if you push tab, the numbers for the timers seem to be disgustingly large, having seen nothing on that in the patch notes.

Honestly it looks disgusting and i really wish it wasn't a thing.

Anyone else noticing this and is there a setting to change to get the numbers back to the smaller nicer looking ones?
